metadata.title: CVE-2019-18603 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OpenAFS before 1.6.24 and 1.8.x before 1.8.5 is prone to informationleakage upon certain error conditions because uninitialized RPC outputvariables are sent over the network to a peer.

criterions.comment: openafs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
